title: João Emanuel
subtitle: Software Engineer | InfoSec | DevOps | Cybersecurity
aboutText: Software Engineer with experience across web and mobile platforms, focused on scalable APIs, security, and high performance. End-to-end delivery: architecture, development, testing, and DevOps, applying Clean Architecture, SOLID, and DDD. Recent experience at Platform Builders, UNICRED, Zallpy, and Facta Financeira.

presentation.title: About Me
presentation.intro: Software Engineer focused on back-end, security, and performance, delivering robust solutions for web and mobile.
presentation.experience: In recent years I worked at companies like Platform Builders, UNICRED, Zallpy, and Facta Financeira, building RESTful APIs, modernizing legacy systems, and automating processes. Experience with PHP (Laravel/Hyperf/Slim), Node.js/NestJS, Python, and Java, applying Clean Architecture, SOLID, testing, and observability.
presentation.passion: I enjoy turning business rules into simple and efficient solutions. Experience with Kafka, Docker, CI/CD (Azure DevOps), Cloudflare, and relational databases. Primary stacks: PHP, NestJS, Python, React/React Native, and Java.
